games.summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C. -- — Donovan Mitchell scored 24 points, Evan Mobley added 14 points and 14 rebounds and the Cleveland Cavaliers jumped out to 21-point first-quarter lead and held on to beat the Charlotte Hornets 94-87 Wednesday night for their fifth road win in the last six games.

Jaylen Brown had 30 points and 10 rebounds and the Boston Celtics opened a 23-point first-half lead before coasting to a 119-104 victory over the Indiana Pacers on Wednesday night. Jarace Walker scored 19 points off the bench for Indiana.
The New York Knicks broke a four-game losing streak without breaking a sweat, crushing the Brooklyn Nets 120-66 on Wednesday night in the most lopsided victory in franchise history.
MEMPHIS, Tenn. Ja Morant led Memphis with 23 points and 12 assists.
blurbs: 🆕 John Konchar (MEM) made his first start of the season. 21 min, 2 pts.
📋 Corey Kispert (ATL) made just his 4th start this season. 8 pts, 1 reb.

games.summary: Jalen Duran scored 20 points and grabbed 15 rebounds, Daniss Jenkins added 17 points and the Detroit Pistons never trailed while cruising to their fourth straight victory, 112-104 over the New Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday night. Saddiq Bey scored 20 points to lead the Western Conference-worst Pelicans, who have lost 14 of their last 16.
blurbs: ⬆️ Micah Peavy (NO) played 27 min (season avg: 16). 17 pts, 7 reb, 2 ast.
⬆️ Daniss Jenkins (DET) played 27 min (season avg: 16). 17 pts, 1 reb, 4 ast.
⬆️ Marcus Sasser (DET) played 21 min (season avg: 9). 9 pts, 1 reb, 4 ast.

games.summary: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander had 40 points, 11 assists and seven rebounds and the NBA-leading Oklahoma City Thunder withstood multiple injury-related absences to trounce the Milwaukee Bucks 122-102 on Wednesday night. Oklahoma City’s Ajay Mitchell scored 18 points in the first half and ended up playing 25 minutes before leaving with a hip bruise.
blurbs: 🆕 Gary Harris (MIL) made his first start of the season. 9 min, 3 pts.
⬆️ Bobby Portis (MIL) played 37 min (season avg: 23). 15 pts, 6 reb, 9 ast.
⬆️ Pete Nance (MIL) played 30 min (season avg: 5). 11 pts, 4 reb, 1 ast.
⬆️ Kenrich Williams (OKC) played 28 min (season avg: 14). 18 pts, 8 reb, 2 ast.

games.summary: Barnes shot 8 of 17 and had eight rebounds, seven assists and four steals while posting his season-high fifth consecutive game with 22 or more points. Brandon Ingram also had 23 points for the Raptors, who outscored the Kings 43-21 in the third quarter and won in Sacramento for the first time since Jan.
blurbs: ⬆️ Jonathan Mogbo (TOR) played 23 min (season avg: 6). 3 pts, 9 reb, 0 ast.
